site_name: 9 St Mary Abbot's Place, LONDON, W8 6LS
description: Verification Order required to confirm the numbering and description of the newly developed residential units at 9 St Mary Abbot's Place W8 6LS, following the demolition of the majority of the existing building and replacement with a residential building comprising 5 flats, linked to Planning application PP/16/02222, as follows:Apartment A, First and Second Floor, 9 St Mary Abbot's Place W8 6LSApartment B, First Floor, 9 St Mary Abbot's Place W8 6LSApartment C, Ground Floor and Basement, 9 St Mary Abbot's Place W8 6LSApartment D, Ground Floor and Basement, 9 St Mary Abbot's Place W8 6LSApartment E, Ground Floor and Basement, 9 St Mary Abbot's Place W8 6LS
